articles.description: Cole Palmer is described as the "best in the Premier League" and likened to legendary forwards from the past after his history-making performance for Chelsea against Brighton.
articles.title: 'Like Bergkamp & Van Persie' - Cole Palmer makes history at Chelsea

articles.description: Mohamed Salah's penalty sends Liverpool back to the top of the Premier League as they beat winless Wolves.
articles.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers 1-2 Liverpool: Mohamed Salah's penalty sends Reds back to top

articles.description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta plays down talk of a feud with Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola, saying he "loves" his former colleague.
articles.title: Guardiola v Arteta: 'I love Pep - but out of my hands if someone wants to damage that'

articles.description: Ante Budimir scores twice as Osasuna stun Barcelona - whose 100% league start is ended by their first domestic defeat of the season.
articles.title: Osasuna 4-2 Barcelona: Hansi Flick's side lose first league game of seaso

articles.description: South Africa hammer Argentina in Nelspruit to win the Rugby Championship for the first time since 2019.
articles.title: South Africa 48-7 Argentina: Springboks win first Rugby Championship since 2019

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Bayern Munich vs Bayer Leverkusen in the Bundesliga
articles.title: Bayern Munich vs Bayer Leverkusen: Bundesliga - BBC Sport

articles.description: Pep Guardiola describes his midfield as "magnificent" as he begins to plot Manchester City's season without injured midfielder Rodri.
articles.title: Newcastle 1-1 Man City: Pep Guardiola begins solving Rodri puzzle with Lewis & Kovacic

articles.description: When Celtic last came to McDiarmid Park, Brendan Rodgers said he had "never been so angry at half-time". This time, it was a different story.
articles.title: Brendan Rodgers' Celtic 'now on same page' on Perth return

articles.description: Turning up late, even by a minute, to see Brentford in the Premier League is not advised - given their knack for early goals.
articles.title: Brentford 1-1 West Ham: 'It must be a world record' - what is Brentford's secret?

articles.description: Fifa names the 12 stadiums set to host the new-look Club World Cup in the United States next year.
articles.title: Club World Cup 2025: 12 host stadiums announced for United States tournament
